resources.string:
In this application you convert any type of number(like: Decimal,Binary,Octal,Hexadecimal) to another type of number. The base of decimal number is 10,base of octal number is 8, base of hexadecimal number is 16 and base of binary number is 2. Some times students faced some problem to convert numbers for that reason we develop this app.They easily use it and if they have any doubt about the process they can visit the learn section.In the learn section we shows some images of process of conversion. After understanding the process they liked the images and share it with their friends. In this way they learn very quickly.\n
How can I use the app?\n After the installation of app you see a converting calculator and there you can convert any number.Above the three dot you found learn option and click it.Then you open the learn activity and you can learn from the images that we are provided . Then you share and like it.Lastly, you enjoy it........:)))
